channel.title: Ip bans and server name
channel.description:
well, first off when i ip ban somebody, they can make another account but as soon as they log on a new account their banned.. how can i fix this so they can't get on at all..
also how do i put my server name at the top of the screen at all times? just like some servers have the time, date, and their name at the top of the screen, i just want my name :)
-SmokeSome
